00024 #define _CTK_MISC_H

00030 #ifndef __SPU__
00031 
00036 static inline void
00037 ctk_write_barrier() {
00038     __asm__ __volatile__ ("eieio":::"memory");
00039 }
00040 
00046 static inline void
00047 ctk_cache_write_barrier() {
00048     __asm__ __volatile__ ("lwsync");
00049 }
00050 
00056 static inline void
00057 ctk_full_barrier() {
00058     __asm__ __volatile__ ("sync":::"memory");
00059 }
00060 
00067 static inline void
00068 ctk_eieio() {
00069     __asm__ __volatile__ ("eieio");
00070 }
00071 
00076 static inline void
00077 ctk_lwsync() {
00078     __asm__ __volatile__ ("lwsync");
00079 }
00080 
00086 static inline void
00087 ctk_sync() {
00088     __asm__ __volatile__ ("sync");
00089 }
00090 
00099 static inline void
00100 ctk_isync() {
00101     __asm__ __volatile__ ("isync");
00102 }

00107 static inline int ctk_nlz(unsigned int x) __attribute__((always_inline));
00108 static inline int ctk_nlz(unsigned int x)
00109 {
00110     int ret;
00111     __asm__ __volatile__ (
00112         "cntlzw %0, %1\n"
00113         : "=&r"(ret)
00114         : "r"(x));
00115     return ret;
00116 }
00117 
00121 static inline int ctk_nlz64(unsigned long long x) __attribute__((always_inline));
00122 static inline int ctk_nlz64(unsigned long long x)
00123 {
00124     int n = ctk_nlz((unsigned long)(x>>32));
00125     if (n == 32) n += ctk_nlz((unsigned long)(x & 0xffffffff));
00126     return n;
00127 }
00128 
00132 static inline int ctk_nlo(unsigned int x) __attribute__((always_inline));
00133 static inline int ctk_nlo(unsigned int x)
00134 {
00135     return ctk_nlz(~x);
00136 }
00137 
00141 static inline int ctk_nlo64(unsigned long long x) __attribute__((always_inline));
00142 static inline int ctk_nlo64(unsigned long long x)
00143 {
00144     int n = ctk_nlo((unsigned long)(x>>32));
00145     if (n == 32) n += ctk_nlo((unsigned long)(x & 0xffffffff));
00146     return n;
00147 }
00148 
00149 #endif

00151 #endif /* _CTK_MISC_H */
